page.title: 04COTTAGE FARM (3)
page.content: Mr. De la Haye has kindly let scientists do an experiment on one of the farm's best cows. The object of the experiment is to get more calves out of one cow. The reason for this is that the cow on which they are experimenting produces better milk, and the cow's good points go over into it's calves. They have put a drug into the cow called a fertility drug. This is to get more eggs out of the cow. When they have done that they plant the eggs into some other cows by operating on them. The result of this is that they hope to get more and better milk from the cows, and more calves in one mating season.
